api_list.name: Get Feature Flag Value
api_list.description: Optimized Endpoint to query the value of a feature Flag
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://flagside-apis.p.rapidapi.com/ff/eval/featureFlagKey"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "flagside-apis.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://flagside-apis.p.rapidapi.com/ff/eval/{featureflagkey}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "flagside-apis.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
